channel.title: Rscps

item.title: Rscps
item.dc:creator: @RSCRevolution RSCRevolution
item.description:
@RSCRevolution wrote:

[quote=“K!zL, post:15, topic:537468”][quote author=BrehmerMan link=topic=656288.msg4398982#msg4398982 date=1390047340]
Rscrevolution is pretty slick. Still haven’t figured out why it has such a low pop. It’s comparable to how project was, but with a few bonuses. In this day and age a 100% remake is out. It’ll never last as us the players are a bunch of lazy no lifing hand me a platter and feed me pussies. Granted I just joined this server 3 days ago, it’s going great so far!
[/quote]
I want a low exp server with new content. Healing magic spells, new mage spells, auction house. 2 servers 1 f2p and 1 p2p.

Someone do that and I’d advertise the shit out of it like I did with Project RSC.

~K!zL[/quote]

Hello,

I am also someone who usually enjoy low rates more. We did a test and sadly it was really not popular. Lot complained that it was too slow for amount of times people can spend in game .

As for the new content. We are replicating the whole game then might continue expending RSC by expending the storyline (Quests, Map , skills, items) keep in mind this is only an idea and dont mean we will 100% do it but… we have few ideas on how to expend the game the right way without breaking it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rscps
item.dc:creator: @K_zL K!zL
item.description:
@K_zL wrote:

BrehmerMan:

Rscrevolution is pretty slick. Still haven’t figured out why it has such a low pop. It’s comparable to how project was, but with a few bonuses. In this day and age a 100% remake is out. It’ll never last as us the players are a bunch of lazy no lifing hand me a platter and feed me pussies. Granted I just joined this server 3 days ago, it’s going great so far!

I want a low exp server with new content. Healing magic spells, new mage spells, auction house. 2 servers 1 f2p and 1 p2p.

Someone do that and I’d advertise the shit out of it like I did with Project RSC.

~K!zL

Read full topic
